name: The Apple and the Maiden
description:
The Apple and the Maiden

Hololive Fangame

A visual novel set around the lore of Fauna from Holo Council. It took me quite a long to make considering it was originally planned to be part of the NaNoRenO22. Nevertheless I'm happy with the end result.

I hope you like this game, but even if you don't, I hope it at least entertained you for a while, and maybe it made you consider checking Fauna and other Hololive members channels.  

Instructions:

Extract all the files to a folder and Run the EXE file.

*Important*

If you're unfamiliar with Fauna's lore, I'd advise you to watch these two videos:

Video1: Fauna's Halloween ASMR

This video is what basically inspired this novel. It's really good as a standalone ASMR and it's full of Lore.

Video2: Nemu's introduction video

In this video we are introduced to Nemu, Fauna's friend and companion. There's not  much lore about her but I find the idea presented on this introduction video very intriguing and that's why you see her in the game.

Disclamer:

This is a Fangame, I can't and won't accept any donation nor money from it. All characters and lore are owned by Hololive/Cover Corp. This game is a creative but unofficial take on them.

Licenses:

The game uses sounds, music, voice, and many assets I bought over time. Most of them are often found in Humble Bundle and Fanatical. If you have any inquiry about the License status there's a credits zip included there. If you recognize your assets and have a concern please let me know.
